com.apple.mrj.dnd
Interface DragListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener, MouseListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
DragAdapter
Deprecated. As of MacOSX 10.2, replaced by Java2 DnD.

public interface DragListener
extends MouseListener

A listener for incoming drag/drop operations. There's obviously no addDragListener method on Component, so use addMouseListener and removeMouseListener instead.

Method Summary
 boolean dragDropped(DragEvent e)
          Deprecated. Sent if the drag ends within the DragReceiver's visible area.
 boolean dragEntered(DragEvent e)
          Deprecated. Sent when the drag enters the DragReceiver's visible area.
 boolean dragExited(DragEvent e)
          Deprecated. Sent when the drag exits the DragReceiver's visible area.
 boolean dragMoved(DragEvent e)
          Deprecated. Sent whenever the drag moves within the DragReceiver's visible area.
 
Methods inherited from interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
mouseClicked, mouseEntered, mouseExited, mousePressed, mouseReleased
